Dr. Miller is the MGH site Principal Investigator for STAMP: Surgically Treated Adjuvant Merkel Cell Carcinoma With Pembrolizumab, a Phase III Trial

Clinical Trials in Melanoma

Dr. Miller is a MGH sub-investigator for INCB039110 in Combination With Dabrafenib and Trametinib in Patients With BRAF-mutant Melanoma and Other Solid Tumors
